name: Rose
description: The rose is a woody perennial flowering plant of the genus Rosa, in the family Rosaceae. It is widely cherished for its beauty, fragrance, and symbolism.

name: Sunflower
description: The sunflower is an annual plant native to the Americas. It is known for its large flowering heads which turn to follow the sun's path, hence its name.

name: Lavender
description: Lavender is a fragrant perennial herb belonging to the mint family. It is prized for its aromatic foliage and purple flowers, often used in aromatherapy and cooking.

name: Fern
description: Ferns are a diverse group of non-flowering vascular plants that reproduce via spores. They are known for their feathery or waxy fronds and are commonly found in moist environments.

name: Cactus
description: Cacti are succulent plants native to the Americas. They are adapted to arid environments, characterized by their thick, fleshy stems and spines.
